DOC.brief_summary: To study the Flow-I breathing circle during low flow general anaesthesia, whether this non-below system has advantages reduced time to reach Et 1MAC (minimal alveolar concentration) and lower consumption of inhaled agent
DOC.detailed_description: Assessing whether there are clinical differences in anaesthetic performance between standard anaesthesia workstation including a below and the new Flow-I device without a below
DOC.criteria: ASA 12 patient 18 65 years scheduled for elective surgery ASA > 2 heart failure COPD
